features: A little change goes a long way - Have you been using the same, probably mismatched, silverware set for years? It's time to upgrade your outdated utensil set and welcome a more modern cutlery set. Our heavy duty, top grade 18/10 stainless steel silverware set was designed for longevity and beauty, with its stunning polished finish. You'll feel and see the difference immediately.

Timeless tableware - Our complete flatware set is more than just a fork and spoon set for basic use. We include a full set of dinner forks, salad forks, serving spoons, teaspoons, and steak knives for 8 diners. Your kitchen won't be complete without our stainless steel utensils. Exceptionally beautiful and functional, our set of eating and serving utensils feels perfect in your hand.

Fitting for every occasion - You'll love the luxury design, solid feel, generous size and ideal weight. Our unique and superior quality silverware pieces are perfect for fancy dinner parties, but versatile enough for family dinners, Sunday brunch, holiday gatherings, backyard BBQ, and even camping trips. Put the finishing touch on any occasion with Tribal Cooking Flatware.

Effortless clean-up - Made from the highest quality stainless steel, our simple yet elegant tableware has a mirror polish and comes out of the dishwasher looking perfect. Whether you choose to hand wash and dry, or machine wash, our silverware remains spotless without rusting or dulling

Useful and innovative kitchen products from Tribal Cooking - We are dedicated to creating elevated, high-functioning kitchen tools that balance practicality and elegance, while standing the test of time. Your happiness is important to us so don't hesitate to reach out if you aren't fully satisfied

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Set Includes All Of The Essentials If you're looking to replace old, worn-down silverware or don't own a set and are looking for something that's high quality and affordable, then you've come to the right place. This 49-piece set has it all. You'll receive four of each: Forks, Spoons, Knives, Salad Forks, and Tea Spoons. Beautiful Gift For Many Occasions This stainless steel cutlery set has that "wow factor" and makes an excellent gift idea for various occasions. The lucky recipient can put them to use right away, and the silverware will keep on giving for years to come. Give them to a friend or family member for Christmas, Hanukkah, Anniversaries, Bridal Showers, Housewarming Parties, Weddings, and more. Useful, Innovative Kitchen Products At Tribal Cooking, our mission is to provide cooks from all walks of life with user-friendly and cost-effective kitchen products that can facilitate small and large kitchen tasks. Nothing makes us happier than hearing that one of our products has made your life in the kitchen a bit easier and more enjoyable Our Customers Are Like Family It would be great to break bread with all of our customers, but obviously, that's not possible. We still love you all, though! We stand behind the quality and craftsmanship of every item we sell. If you have a question, concern, or simply want to say hello, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Classic Design That Catches Your Eye Instantly upgrade any meal when you introduce this flatware set into your home. Expertly crafted from premium 18/10 stainless steel with a sleek, polished finish, this cutlery set exudes elegance and sophistication. It will fit in seamlessly with any tablescape, table decor, and dinnerware. Perfect For Elegant & Casual Meals Wouldn't it be great to own a silverware set that can be used for elegant, upscale meals as well as casual meals like family dinner or Sunday brunch? We like to say that you can "dress" this set up or down. There's no need to dig through the closet to dust off that elegant flatware that you only use once or twice a year when you own this set. Well-Balanced, Ergonomic Silverware When you pick up some silverware, you can instantly tell that quality is subpar just by the way it feels in your hand. They may feel flimsy, unbalanced, or have an unusual texture. Conversely, other silverware lets you know that they're high quality. You'll get a high-end feel the moment you pick up a utensil from our set. Rust Resistant & Dishwasher Safe 18/10 stainless steel is known for its durability and sturdiness. It's highly resistant to rust, bending, and general wear and tear. You can either wash this flatware by hand using soap and water or toss them in the dishwasher for an even faster clean up. Either way, they'll come out sparkling clean.

Silverware Cutlery Set - 49 Piece Plastic Cutting Boards - 3 Pack Silicone Oven Mitts Heavy Duty Kitchen Scissors Stainless Steel Measuring Spoons - Set of 8 Wooden Floating Wall Shelves - 3 Pack What’s Included 49 piece flatware set Large: 16'' x 10'' Medium: 12.5'' x 8'' Small: 10'' x 6'' One pair XL oven mitts One pair all-purpose kitchen scissors 1/4 Cup, 1/3 Cup, 1/2 Cup, 1 Cup 1/4 Tsp, 1/2 Tsp, 1 Tsp, 1 Tbsp Large: 17"× 4.7"× 4.2" Medium: 13"× 4.7"× 4.2" Small: 9"× 4.7"× 4.2" Material 18/10 stainless steel Non-porous TPR plastic Non-slip silicone outer layer Natural cotton inner lining 2CR13 stainless steel 202 stainless steel Paulownia wood, Metal brackets Features Polished finish, Reusable, Easy to clean Professional-quality, Won't blunt cutlery, Deep juice groove, Easy to clean High heat resistance, Comfortable, Stylish, Easy to clean Micro-serrated edge, High-grade rivets, Ultra sharp blades, Ergonomic handle, Built-in nutcracker Sleek, stylish design, User-friendly, Complete set, Marked for convenience Boho design, Easy to hang, Great for storage Makes a Great Gift ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price -great quality
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality VS price. I like the design. Not too heavy, beautiful classic lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this set, buying another now! The large spoons are quite large, but when using them I haven't actually noticed it. They can double as serving spoons for sure, though! The smaller sizes are absolutely perfect for my young kids (4-8). They clean well in the dishwasher. I have had them just a couple weeks but so far they are holding up just fine, no issues at all. They really are absolutely beautiful and compliment my oriental Churchill England plates and bowls so well. We feel so fancy at meal time now! Very glad I went with this set over any others.I personally didn't buy this set for the knives, so I'm not letting it affect my rating, but the steak knives don't cut very well. They did include an extra paring knife that cuts well. Interestingly, the butter knives are sharper than any others I have had, lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and affordable
reviews.reviewText: Really like this set. Very modern and simple. It’s exactly what I was looking for and they are affordable. I’ve had them for about 3 weeks now and they are holding up well. Comes with the whole set which I really like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the price
reviews.reviewText: This set overall seems like a good deal for the price. However, we ordered the black set and some of the items already had the black coming off…Not sure how to feel about that but the products feel durable overall. I guess the test of time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: first thing I have to save they’re very sturdy. Strong. Not very easy to bend, even when using force.They’re not thin but they’re not heavy fat either. They’re perfectly balanced. I would say about medium thickness. I replaced my old knives which were the overweight, kind very heavy And these feel sharper, stronger, durable, overall better.I also like the golden coating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for money
reviews.reviewText: These are nice and heavy enough to use to serve guests, not flimsy and cheap. I bought these for my daughter to use in her first apartment and she is very happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was able to use the steak knives to replace the missing ones in my wood block. They fit perfectly. Nice quality utensils for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a little sharp...
reviews.reviewText: It is a good product, beautiful design but a is bit sharp.

The set is plain, no design, but that adds to the classic look. The steak knives are quite sharp and sturdy. Overall the set has a nice weight to each piece, heavy enough to withstand a lot of use, but no so heavy as to be clunky.
Me encantaron. Son hermosos. Solo una sugerencia. Deberian tener un portafolio para guardarlos. Por que la caja de carton se rompe. Pero de que son bellos y buena calidad, lo son.
Love that it always looks so clean and shiny even after so many washes in the dishwasher. Highly recommend!
Son muy elegantes, fáciles de usar y limpiar. Excelente producto.

I bought this set for are friend , ( his house burned down & has nothing ) so imgetting his a bunch of kitchen stuff , i got them & took a look & there very nice kitchen ware , & my friend really likes them , thinking of getting myself a set
